005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter.MetaschemaDataTypeProvider;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.InvalidValueForCastFunctionException;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.impl.HostnameItemImpl;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.IAtomicOrUnionType;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.InvalidTypeMetapathException;
013
014import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
015
016/**
017 * An atomic Metapath item containing a hostname data value.
018 */
019public interface IHostnameItem extends IStringItem {
020  /**
021   * Get the type information for this item.
022   *
023   * @return the type information
024   */
025  @NonNull
026  static IAtomicOrUnionType<IHostnameItem> type() {
027    return MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.HOSTNAME.getItemType();
028  }
029
030  @Override
031  default IAtomicOrUnionType<IHostnameItem> getType() {
032    return type();
033  }
034
035  /**
036   * Construct a new host name item using the provided string {@code value}.
037   *
038   * @param value
039   *          a string representing a host name value
040   * @return the new item
041   */
042  @NonNull
043  static IHostnameItem valueOf(@NonNull String value) {
044    try {
045      return new HostnameItemImpl(MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.HOSTNAME.parse(value));
046    } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
047      throw new InvalidTypeMetapathException(
048          null,
049          String.format("Invalid hostname value '%s'. %s",
050              value,
051              ex.getLocalizedMessage()),
052          ex);
053    }
054  }
055
056  /**
057   * Cast the provided type to this item type.
058   *
059   * @param item
060   *          the item to cast
061   * @return the original item if it is already this type, otherwise a new item
062   *         cast to this type
063   * @throws InvalidValueForCastFunctionException
064   *           if the provided {@code item} cannot be cast to this type
065   */
066  @NonNull
067  static IHostnameItem cast(@NonNull IAnyAtomicItem item) {
068    try {
069      return item instanceof IHostnameItem
070          ? (IHostnameItem) item
071          : valueOf(item.asString());
072    } catch (IllegalStateException | InvalidTypeMetapathException ex) {
073      // asString can throw IllegalStateException exception
074      throw new InvalidValueForCastFunctionException(ex);
075    }
076  }
077
078  @Override
079  default IHostnameItem castAsType(IAnyAtomicItem item) {
080    return cast(item);
081  }
082}
